title: As a society, how are we doing? - Quora

response.answer_text: less than good but its on its way we see the possible future consequences if we do not act on what we know we need changing ( during the next 10 to 30 years i guess ) perhaps we need another 5 years or so of dilli dalling, going trough all phases of stubborn refusal, denial, self-enlarging or self-condemning ego games … till we arrive at a big enough mass of individual human beings who are deciding out of free will to act in every day life, think real carefully on all buying and production decicions i guess once we have sorted ourselves out … change can happen swiftly perhaps even wise to give it some few years of not too much of a panic or pressure … to allow everyone to gear up for change in ones every own style and timetable
